error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the device. Please check the device configuration and network connection and try again.

advanced.name: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Configure advanced setting of the device

device_options.title: Device features
device_options.description: The Gree API doesn't have a reliable method of getting the supported features of a device. Please use the options bellow to the best of your knowledge about your device.

data_description.external_temperature_sensor: If set will replace the built-in HVAC temperature sensor
data_description.external_humidity_sensor: If set will replace the built-in HVAC humidity sensor
data_description.max_online_attempts: The number of attempts to communicate with the device before it is marked as unavailable
data_description.timeout: The timeout for each of the connection attempts
data_description.restore_states: If set to true, when the integration is started the device will be overriden by previous states of the integration instead of using the current device state.

reconfigure.title: Device features
reconfigure.description: The Gree API doesn't have a reliable method of getting the supported features of a device. Please use the options bellow to the best of your knowledge about your device.

data_description.external_temperature_sensor: If set will replace the built-in HVAC temperature sensor
data_description.external_humidity_sensor: If set will replace the built-in HVAC humidity sensor
data_description.max_online_attempts: The number of attempts to communicate with the device before it is marked as unavailable
data_description.timeout: The timeout for each of the connection attempts
data_description.restore_states: If set to true, when the integration is started the device will be overriden by previous states of the integration instead of using the current device state.

indoor_temperature.name: Indoor Temperature
indoor_temperature.description: The temperature reported by the HVAC indoors unit

outdoor_temperature.name: Outdoor Temperature
outdoor_temperature.description: The temperature reported by the HVAC outdoors unit

humidity.name: Indoor Humidity
humidity.description: The humidity reported by the HVAC indoors unit

target_temp_step.name: Temperature Step
target_temp_step.description: Sets the increment step for adjusting the target temperature.

temperature_units.name: Temperature Units
temperature_units.description: Select the temperature units used by the device.

outside_temperature.name: Outside Temperature
outside_temperature.description: Shows the outside temperature measured by the air conditioner's external sensor.

room_humidity.name: Room Humidity
room_humidity.description: Shows the room humidity level measured by the air conditioner's internal sensor.

auto_light.name: Auto Display Light
auto_light.description: Automatically controls the display lights based on HVAC operations. When enabled, lights will turn on/off with the AC unit.

auto_xfan.name: Auto X-Fan
auto_xfan.description: Automatically controls the X-Fan mode based on HVAC operations. When enabled, X-Fan will automatically turn on in cooling and dry modes.

lights.name: Display Light
lights.description: Controls the display lights on the air conditioner unit.

xfan.name: X-Fan
xfan.description: Enables or disables the X-Fan mode for extra drying when turning off.

health.name: Health
health.description: Enables or disables the Health mode for air ionization and purification.

powersave.name: Power Save
powersave.description: Enables or disables the power saving mode for energy efficiency. Only available in cooling mode.

eightdegheat.name: Smart Heat 8ºC
eightdegheat.description: Enables or disables the 8°C heating mode for frost protection. Only available in heating mode.

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.description: Enables or disables the sleep mode for comfortable overnight operation. Only available in cooling or heating mode.

air.name: Fresh Air
air.description: Enables or disables the fresh air circulation mode.

anti_direct_blow.name: Anti Direct Blow
anti_direct_blow.description: Prevents direct air flow from blowing on people by adjusting the air deflector position.

light_sensor.name: Display Auto Brightness
light_sensor.description: Enables or disables light sensor for automatic brightness. Requires lights to be enabled.

beeper.name: Beeper
beeper.description: Controls the beeper sounds from the air conditioner unit. When enabled, the unit will make sounds for button presses and status changes.

change_while_device_off.message: You cannot change this while the device is off.

turbo_availability.message: Trubo mode is not available in Dry and Fan-only modes.

quiet_availability.message: Quiet mode is only available in Dry and Cool modes.

generic.message: There was a problem performing the requested change, please consult the integration log.
